text:
Raskolnikov was confused. He stared at the unexpected visitor, trying to process what was happening. 

“Svidrigaïlov? This can’t be real!” he exclaimed, feeling bewildered. 

But Svidrigaïlov didn’t look shocked at all. 

“I’m here for two reasons,” he said calmly. “First, I wanted to meet you. I’ve heard some pretty interesting things about you.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov is bewildered by the unexpected visit from Svidrigaïlov, whom he finds hard to believe is actually there.
